Class Planet

java.lang.Object
  Planet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class Planet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

Class representing a single planet in the game. All fields are public to speed up development. Contains uninitilized fields for temporary meta information.

The coordinates of the planet, used to calculate distance.

incoming

public java.util.List<Fleet> incoming

safety

public int safety
An amount of ships on the planet, that the algorithms considers safe to be moved to another planet without endangering this one. The minimal amount of ships that need to be garrisoned to protect the planet. Always less that the current number of ships on the planet.

tmp

public int tmp
Temporary field used to optimize the distance calculation mechanism. Speeds up sorting. Causes the game state to be non-thread-safe.
